item.title: Liisa add a quote by Tim McGraw
item.description: "Well, you do what you do and you pay for your sins, but there's no such thing as what might have been. That's a waste of time; drive you outta your mind" -- Tim McGraw

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Michelle Paver
item.description: "There's always a choice,' said Torak, and walked backward off the cliff." -- Michelle Paver

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Sarah Addison Allen
item.description: "I think Heaven will be like a first kiss." -- Sarah Addison Allen

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Lisa Unger
item.description: "The universe conspires to reveal the truth and to make your path easy if you have the courage to follow the signs." -- Lisa Unger

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "And that is how change happens. One gesture. One person. One moment at a time." -- Libba Bray

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Simon and Garfunkel
item.description: "I've got nothing to do today but smile." -- Simon and Garfunkel

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Nicholas Evans
item.description: "Sometimes what seems like surrender isn't surrender at all. It's about what's going on in our hearts. About seeing clearly the way life is and accepting it and being true to it, whatever the pain, because the pain of not being true to it is far, far greater. " -- Nicholas Evans

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "You are, and always have been, my dream." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "I am the literary equivalent of a Big Mac and fries." -- Stephen King

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "I cannot live without books." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Trisha Yearwood
item.description: "What's meant to be will always find a way" -- Trisha Yearwood

item.title: Liisa add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "All the world is made of faith, and trust, and pixie dust." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Faith is walking face-first and full-speed into the dark. If we truly knew all the answers in advance as to the meaning of life and the nature of God and the destiny of our souls, our belief would not be a leap of faith and it would not be a courageous act of humanity; it would just be... a prudent insurance policy." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Liisa add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "Before Elvis there was nothing." -- John Lennon

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description:
"Of all the spirits I have seen, only Elvis and Mr. Sinatra are able to manifest in the garments of their choice. Others haunt me always in whatever they were wearing when they died.
This is one reason I will never attend a costume party dressed as the traditional symbol of the New Year, in nothing buy a diaper and a top hat. Welcomed into either Hell or Heaven, I do not want to cross the threshold to the sound of demonic or angelic laughter. ~Odd Thomas" -- Dean Koontz

item.title: Liisa add a quote by Gabrielle Zevin
item.description: "They should tell you when youâ€™re born: have a suitcase heart, be ready to travel." -- Gabrielle Zevin
